thread.title: 72 hours of fun
thread.title_full: 72 hours of fun - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: allforthebetter
title: 72 hours of fun
text: Very quaint hotel in peaceful neighborhood. Close to two tube lines, Bayswater and Queensway are within 4 blocks of hotel. The rooms are very small but can work for two people as long as you don't spend a lot of time in there. The gardens are only a few blocks away and there are bike rentals there.
